channel.title: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter on Steam
channel.description:
My jaw hit the floor this morning when I saw this scroll through my steam store. Engine has been updated, I'm just about to launch this thing and super stoked about it. Anyone else here remember Turok?
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/405820/header.jpg?t=1450377745[/img]

item.title: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter on Steam
item.dc:creator: _rot_fodder
item.description:
It is pretty expensive, I was suprised when I saw how much they were asking.

All the same though, I’ve been having a blast playing it, I tried an emulator version a while ago and was pretty dissapointed, I think this is like half life 2 update though, where it plays like I REMEMBER it, rather than like how it actually was, which is to say, a lot more crappy than I remember.

Read full topic

item.title: Turok: Dinosaur Hunter on Steam
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Night Dive Studios have been doing nice work reviving old classics like System Shock and now this.

That said, Turok remastered on Steam is a bit too expensive for my taste.

Read full topic
